name: L.L. Bean Military & First Responder Discount
description: 10% off outdoor gear and clothing for military and first responders
fullDescription: L.L. Bean offers a 10% discount to military personnel, veterans, and first responders on most purchases through SheerID verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off most purchases
- Applies to outdoor gear, clothing, footwear
- Valid on llbean.com
- Excludes some items (kayaks, canoes, gift cards)
- Year-round discount
howToGetIt:
1. Visit llbean.com
2. Add items to cart
3. At checkout, verify through SheerID
4. Eligible: active military, veterans, retirees, first responders
5. 10% discount applied automatically
keywords: L.L. Bean, military discount, veteran, first responder, 10% off, outdoor gear, clothing
